item.title: North Carolina residents fight back against massive tech project potentially coming to their town
item.description: Energy Storage Solutions LLC proposes a $6.4 billion data center in Tarboro, North Carolina, promising economic benefits amid community opposition.

item.title: US job growth through March revised lower by 911K

item.title: Auto workers union condemns Hyundai working conditions in wake of federal raid on Georgia site
item.description: UAW condemns Hyundai for poor worker safety record following immigration raid at Georgia electric car battery factory that detained 475 people.

item.title: Americans hit record low confidence in finding new jobs since tracking began in 2013
item.description: Data from the New York Federal Reserve showed Americans' confidence in finding new jobs hit a record low of 44.9% in August, the lowest since tracking...
